Title: Nest Pro 3rd Generation HF001631-GB PK
Description: Compatible with a wide range of central heating systems, this Nest 3rd generation thermostat in stainless steel can operate combi boilers, system and heat-only boilers, domestic hot water tanks and biomass boilers and is also compatible with hydronic underfloor systems, air-source and ground-source heat pumps (heating only), zoned systems and heating systems with Open Therm technology. Connecting via WiFi to control the temperature from your smartphone, tablet or laptop via the Nest App, this thermostat puts you in control of your home from anywhere in the world. With the ability to recognise the average temperature of the home, Nest uses sensors to automatically adjust when the house is empty for reduced waste and lower bills.
category: Heating/Central Heating Controls/Smart Thermostats/Smart Thermostats.csv -> Nest Pro 3rd Generation HF001631-GB PK

Title: Hive mini heating thermostat
Description: Compact and sleekly designed, the Hive mini heating thermostat offers all the benefits of smart heating in a reduced size package. Suitable for connection to most LPG boilers, oil boilers with existing thermostats or programmers and electric boilers with standard thermostats, Hive incorporates a wide range of features including instant alerts, frost protection, geolocation and holiday mode. App-connected, this clever thermostat allows homeowners to control their home heating from anywhere in the world.
